name: Stephen Hebert
summary: Experienced full stack web development professional seeking fully remote opportunities in development, management & technical training.

roles.title: Lead Developer / Manager
roles.description: Managing development for enterprise Agile modernization project.  Coding, testing, reviewing & deploying application.  Providing technical guidance to project managers, product owners & business analysts. Migrating legacy database systems. Developing standards for security, auditing, CI/CD, UI/UX, performance & automated testing. Supporting statewide developer recruiting, training & mentorship. Configuring servers to meet project needs. Diagnosing & resolving network & production issues.
highlights: Architected PBAC system to meet business & InfoSec requirements.
Led redevelopment of two public-facing reactive web applications to optimize UX, performance & accessibility.

roles.title: Senior Developer
roles.description: Coded, tested, reviewed, deployed, released, administrated, maintained & supported application.
highlights: Developed Javascript libraries for custom typeahead & grid UI components.
roles.environment: Javascript, VueJS, C#, Github, Agile, HTML, CSS, JIRA, AWS, ADFS, Identity Server, IIS, SQL Server 2016, EF Core, Octopus, Cypress, Veracode, Figma, SSIS

roles.title: Technical Analyst
roles.description: Provided user, network, server & cloud service administration & technical support.

roles.title: Developer, Consultant, Technical Trainer
roles.description: Consulted on various web design & development projects.  Delivered individualized instruction in web development.

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Coded, tested, provisioned, supported & administrated proprietary network product & service.
highlights: Developed web-based network configuration interface for modified routing appliance.
roles.environment: Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, HTML, Javascript

roles.title: QA & Support Analyst
roles.description: Manually tested user interfaces & function of proprietary rackmount appliance & documented issues. Provisioned & shipped products.  Provided remote technical support.

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Developed & maintained static website.  Provided hardware, software, peripheral, database & network support.

roles.title: Technical Instructor / DBA
roles.description: Delivered group & individualized instruction on web development & office software. Maintained legacy databases & applications.
roles.environment: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Photoshop, Lotus Notes

roles.title: Developer / Co-Founder
roles.description: Designed, developed & deployed static websites for government & industry clients.

roles.title: Support Technician
roles.description: Initialized, installed, configured, issued & supported Windows workstations.  Troubleshooted & repaired computer systems & peripherals.
